column4: Hi. Printer: canon pixma MP270 is printing, but scanner doesnt work... why? maybe i should install one more driver for scanner? :(
i would check the forums to see if anyone else has that scanner working.. Canon has very poor linux support.
and check the 'sane'  scanner driver web site.
sounds like you got 'mouse over focus' set some where in the menus if you have to have  the mouse in a window to 'activate' it.. im not even sure where that setting is at.. its not the default
